result.execSummary:
The defendant Joshua J Harris was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Joshua J Harris is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Joshua J Harris was found guilty of Possess Drug Paraphernalia, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.573(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes:
1.  AODA Assessment.
2.  Defendant is to comply with the informal agreement in the CHIPS case.

records.addlTxt: Petition and Stipulation to Waive Appearance and Order Extending Probation for Unpaid Court Obligations - 1 year (07/14/2017)

1:04 p.m.  Defendant present in court without counsel.  Agent Mueller not present in court.  Corut quashes the warrant previously issued.  Statement by defendant - was never informed by the Agent that any monies were due.  Court finds the defendant has not made a good faith efford or no effort at all and extends probation for one year.  Court informs the defendant that if the monies are not paid in the next year, court cah fashion conditions to include jail time.  Court goes over right to counsel and how to obtain counsel.

Court adjourned at 1:08 p.m.

1:19 p.m.  No appearance by the defendant.  Agent Todd Mueller present in court.  Statement by Agent Mueller - knows where the defendant lives and not sure why defendant is not here.  Court orders a warrant - forthwith and may be purged by paying $443.00.

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Joshua J Harris
Current: 252 E. Noyes St, Berlin, WI 54923 United States  (Effective: 07-14-2015)
Prior: 260 N Washington St Apt 205, Berlin, WI 54941

9:18 a.m.  Defendant present in court without counsel.  Lisa Vanden Branden for the State of Wisconsin.  Court recites agreement - defendant will plea to count 1 and count 2 will be dismissed.  State concurs.  Defendant concurs.  Court goes over right to counsel.  Defendant waives right to counsel.  Court accepts waiver.

Court goes over constitutional rights with the defendant - defendant waives these rights.  Court goes over the elements of each offense.  Court instructs defendant of the maximum penalty.  Court instructs defendant regarding deportation.

Defendant enters a plea of NO CONTEST.  Court finds the plea is made freely, voluntarily, intelligently and understandingly.  Court finds there is a factual basis to support the plea.  Court finds the defendant guilty on count 1.  Court orders count 2 be dismissed.  Court orders the judgment of conviction be entered here today.  ADA confirms compliance with victim witness rights.  Sentencing statement by DA.  Statement by the defendant.

Court sentences the defendant to:  30 days county jail stayed and places the defendant on probation for 1 year.

CONDITIONS:

AODA assessment
Defendant is to comply with the informal agreement in the CHIPS case
Court costs

No sentence credit.

Court adjourned at 9:26 a.m.
Settlement Form (PTC)
Plea/sentencing hearing at 07-14-2015 09:15 am.
Status hearing at 07-07-2015 09:30 am

1:13 p.m.  Defendant present in court without counsel.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Statement by defendant - set up a date with the DA and was to have the CHIPS case at the same time.  Defendant will be representing himself.  Court goes over right to counsel.  Defendant waives right to counsel.  Court accepts waiver.  Court will set for status hearing on July 7, 2015 at 9:30 a.m.

Court adjourned at 1:

1:37 p.m.  Defendant present in court without counsel.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant confirms receipt of the criminal complaint and waives reading.  Court instructs the defendant of the maximum penalty on each count.  Court finds probable cause.  Court instructs the defendant of his right to an attorney.  Defendant stands mute.  Court enters a plea of NOT GUILTY on behalf of the defendant.  DA makes bond recommendation.  Court sets bond at $500.00 signature bond and conditions of:  Defendant is to complete processing with the Green Lake County Sheriff's Department.  Court will set for Status Hearing on May 4, 2015 at 1:00 p.m.
